role_description: An Ansible role that installs KiTTY on macOS or Linux
role_description_full_overview: [KiTTY](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/) is designed for power keyboard users. To that end all its controls work with the keyboard (although it fully supports mouse interactions as well). Its configuration is a simple, human editable, single file for easy reproducibility.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs KiTTY on macOS or Linux.
